subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Thierry Henry’s signing with the Red Bulls is more akin to Pelé and Franz Beckenbauer’s days with the 1970s Cosmos than David Beckham’s time with the Galaxy.
snippet: Thierry Henry’s signing with the Red Bulls is more akin to Pelé and Franz Beckenbauer’s days with the 1970s Cosmos than David Beckham’s time with the Galaxy.
